panels.imagePrompt: Colorful Rajasthani village scene, old man with big white mustache and colorful turban receiving a new smartphone as gift, family gathered around, bright festive colors, cartoon style
Young Indian boy teaching elderly Rajasthani grandfather how to use smartphone, grandfather holding phone upside down, confused expression, colorful room, comedy cartoon style
Elderly Rajasthani man sending voice message on phone while shouting loudly, entire family covering ears, phone screen showing WhatsApp, comedy cartoon style

Elderly Rajasthani man accidentally video calling someone while in bathroom, shocked expression, holding phone away from face, comedy cartoon style, censored appropriately

panels.imagePrompt: Empty Mumbai local train platform at midnight, single flickering fluorescent light, fog rolling in, distant train headlight approaching, dark noir cinematic style, deep blue and black tones
Tired young Indian office worker with loose tie entering empty Mumbai local train compartment at night, harsh overhead light, eerie emptiness, noir thriller atmosphere
Mysterious middle-aged Indian man in black coat and hat sitting in corner of empty Mumbai local train, dark piercing eyes, dim overhead light casting sharp shadows, thriller noir style
Close up of shocked young Indian man's face in train, eyes wide, sweat drops, harsh overhead fluorescent light, dramatic shadows, thriller suspense mood
Train window view showing city lights blurring past at high speed, reflection of scared man and mysterious stranger in glass, dramatic noir lighting, rain drops on window
Mysterious man leaning forward in dark train, revealing a old pocket watch, glowing eerily, face half in shadow half in light, intense thriller atmosphere, cinematic close up
Young Indian man grabbing emergency chain in train desperately, train sparks flying outside window, dramatic motion blur, intense thriller climax, cinematic angle from below

Mumbai local train standing still at a normal station at morning, crowd boarding, young Indian office worker sitting inside looking dazed and confused, sunlight streaming in, surreal contrast to dark thriller, is it a dream

panels.imagePrompt: Traditional Bhojpuri village house exterior with a brand new WiFi router mounted outside on the wall, confused villagers staring at it, bright sunny Indian village, colorful cartoon comedy style

Elderly Indian village man in dhoti and thick glasses examining WiFi router closely like its an alien device, turning it upside down, antennas sticking out, confused expression, bright colorful Indian village room, comedy cartoon style

Entire Indian village crowd with smartphones in hands rushing towards one house, stampede comedy scene, old women in sarees running with phones, children with tablets, colorful village chaos, bright comedy cartoon style

Old Indian village woman in saree sitting on cot watching YouTube cooking videos on phone, old man watching cricket on tablet, child playing mobile game, buffalo looking at phone screen too, comedy chaos in village courtyard, colorful cartoon style

WiFi router overheating and smoking, Indian village man desperately pouring water on it to cool it down, sparks flying, other villagers panicking, fire extinguisher someone holding, colorful comedy chaos, cartoon style

Indian village people protesting outside a house with signs demanding WiFi back, angry mob with smartphones raised, village panchayat style gathering, old man on chair like a judge, comedy protest scene, bright colorful cartoon style

Elderly Indian village man in dhoti secretly hiding inside a room watching reels on smartphone with headphones, caught by grandson who opens door, embarrassed expression, dim room with phone glow on face, comedy cartoon style

Indian village house with a huge professional satellite dish and multiple WiFi antennas on roof, entire village gathered outside taking selfies, elderly man proudly standing on roof like a king, young man facepalming below, bright sunny comedy cartoon style

panels.imagePrompt: Small roadside chai stall in Indian city at dawn, a young poor boy of 14 making tea on a small stove, steam rising, early morning golden light, humble setting, torn but clean clothes, determined expression, cinematic warm tones, inspirational mood

Young Indian boy counting coins on a charpai at night, his mother sleeping tired in background, single dim bulb, small cramped room, emotional scene, warm but melancholic lighting, cinematic inspirational style

Young Indian boy studying under street light at night with open books, tea stall closed beside him, stray dog sleeping nearby, determination in eyes, cinematic warm lighting, inspiring scene of poverty and ambition

Young Indian man being laughed at and mocked by rich businessmen in suits outside a bank, he is holding a loan application, rejection letter visible, humiliation scene, dramatic cinematic lighting, determination in his eyes despite mockery

Small but clean chai shop with a young Indian man proudly serving special chai to customers, hand-painted signboard, customers smiling, warm golden interior lighting, growing business, cinematic inspirational style

Multiple chai shop branches shown in a montage style across Indian cities, same brand logo on all, young Indian businessman in simple but neat clothes looking at his growing empire, city skyline, warm sunset, success montage, cinematic inspirational

Elderly Indian mother in simple cotton saree crying happy tears, her successful young son in business suit touching her feet respectfully, beautiful new house in background, emotional Indian family moment, golden warm lighting, cinematic

Split image: left side shows 14 year old poor boy making chai on roadside stove, right side shows same person now successful in office with chai cup in hand, same determined eyes, before and after transformation, warm golden tones, inspirational cinematic style
